mapper.insert: insert into paid(tid, cid, aid, cancel_amount, cancel_tax_free_amount, userid, pg_token, partner_order_id) values(#{tid}, #{cid}, #{aid}, #{cancel_amount}, #{cancel_tax_free_amount}, #{userid}, #{pg_token}, #{partner_order_id})
mapper.update: update paid set tid=#{tid}, cid=#{cid}, aid=#{aid}, cancel_amount=#{cancel_amount}, cancel_tax_free_amount=#{cancel_tax_free_amount}, userid=#{userid}, pg_token=#{pg_token}, partner_order_id=#{partner_order_id} where id = #{id}
